TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventWaitHandle extends System.Threading.WaitHandle

summary.span: 表示一个线程同步事件。

span.span: Represents a thread synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许线程通过发出信号互相通信。The class allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 通常，一个或多个线程会在上阻塞 ，直到被阻止的线程调用 方法，释放一个或多个被阻止的线程。Typically, one or more threads block on an until an unblocked thread calls the method, releasing one or more of the blocked threads. 线程可以 通过调用 `static` `Shared` Visual Basic) 方法中的 (向发出信号，然后在其上进行阻止 。A thread can signal an and then block on it, by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. > [!NOTE] > 类提供对已命名的系统同步事件的访问。The class provides access to named system synchronization events. 已发出信号的的行为 取决于其重置模式。The behavior of an that has been signaled depends on its reset mode. 使用标志创建的 时，在释放单个等待线程后，将自动重置。An created with the flag resets automatically when signaled, after releasing a single waiting thread. 在 方法获得调用前，一直向使用 标志创建的 发出信号。An created with the flag remains signaled until its method is called. 自动重置事件提供对资源的独占访问权限。Automatic reset events provide exclusive access to a resource. 如果向自动重置事件发出信号时没有线程正在等待，此信号会一直发出到有线程尝试在等待句柄上等待。If an automatic reset event is signaled when no threads are waiting, it remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it. 此时，事件会释放相应线程并立即重置自身，同时阻止后续线程。The event releases the thread and immediately resets, blocking subsequent threads. 手动重置事件与入口类似。Manual reset events are like gates. 如果事件未发出信号，则等待它的线程将会阻止。When the event is not signaled, threads that wait on it will block. 当事件收到信号时，将释放所有正在等待的线程，并且事件将保持发出信号 (即，后续等待不会阻止) ，直到 调用其方法。When the event is signaled, all waiting threads are released, and the event remains signaled (that is, subsequent waits do not block) until its method is called. 如果一个线程必须完成某个活动，然后其他线程才能继续，则手动重置事件很有用。Manual reset events are useful when one thread must complete an activity before other threads can proceed. 对象可以与 `static` `Shared` Visual Basic) 和方法中的 (一起使用 。 objects can be used with the `static`(`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[同步基元概述](/dotnet/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives)一文中的 "[线程交互" 或 "信号](/dotnet/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives#thread-interaction-or-signaling)" 部分。For more information, see the [Thread interaction, or signaling](/dotnet/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives#thread-interaction-or-signaling) section of the [Overview of synchronization primitives](/dotnet/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives) article. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法重载，以允许主线程向阻止的线程发出信号，并等待线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 该示例启动五个线程，并允许它们阻止 使用标志创建的 ，然后在每次用户按 ENTER 键时释放一个线程。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 然后，该示例将另一线程排队，并通过使用标志创建的所有线程释放它们 。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.
Managed Threading
Overview of synchronization primitives

param.span: 如果为 ，则将初始状态设置为终止；如果为 ，则将初始状态设置为非终止。

span.span: to set the initial state to signaled; to set it to nonsignaled.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定等待句柄最初是否处于终止状态，以及它是自动重置还是手动重置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled, and whether it resets automatically or manually.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件的初始状态为非终止，则等待事件的线程将会阻止。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止" 并且为 指定了标志 `mode` ，则等待事件的线程不会阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止"，并且 `mode` 为 ，则将立即释放等待事件的第一个线程，在此之后，事件将被重置，后续线程将被阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法重载，以允许主线程向阻止的线程发出信号，并等待线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 该示例启动五个线程，并允许它们阻止 使用标志创建的 ，然后在每次用户按 ENTER 键时释放一个线程。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses ENTER key. 然后，该示例将另一线程排队，并通过使用标志创建的所有线程释放它们 。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定在此调用后创建的等待句柄最初是否处于终止状态，它是自动重置还是手动重置，以及系统同步事件的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, and the name of a system synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `name` 是 `null` 或空字符串， 则创建一个本地。If `name` is `null` or an empty string, a local is created. 如果为参数指定了名称的系统事件 `name` 已存在，则忽略该 `initialState` 参数。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对已命名的系统事件使用此构造函数时，请将指定 `false` 为 `initialState` 。When using this constructor for named system events, specify `false` for `initialState`. 此构造函数无法确定是否已创建已命名的系统事件，因此您无法对命名事件的状态进行任何假设。This constructor provides no way to determine whether a named system event was created, so you cannot make any assumptions about the state of the named event. 若要确定是否已创建命名事件，请使用 构造函数或 构造函数。To determine whether a named event was created, use the constructor or the constructor. 如果事件的初始状态为非终止，则等待事件的线程将会阻止。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止" 并且为 指定了标志 `mode` ，则等待事件的线程不会阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止"，并且 `mode` 为 ，则将立即释放等待事件的第一个线程，在此之后，事件将被重置，后续线程将被阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, and a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为参数指定了名称的系统事件 `name` 已存在，则忽略该 `initialState` 参数。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 调用此构造函数后，在 Visual Basic) 中为参数 (参数指定的变量中的值， `ref` `ByRef` `createdNew` 以确定已存在还是已创建已命名的系统事件。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic)`createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果事件的初始状态为非终止，则等待事件的线程将会阻止。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止" 并且为 指定了标志 `mode` ，则等待事件的线程不会阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止"，并且 `mode` 为 ，则将立即释放等待事件的第一个线程，在此之后，事件将被重置，后续线程将被阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定如果等待句柄作为此调用的结果而创建，最初是否通过信号通知此句柄；指定是否自动或手动重置系统同步事件的名称和布尔变量，其值在该调用后将指示是否创建了已命名系统事件，以及是否将访问控制安全性应用到命名事件（如果已创建该事件）。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created, and the access control security to be applied to the named event if it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数在创建已命名的系统事件时将其应用于该事件，从而防止其他代码控制该事件。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system event when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the event. 此构造函数初始化 表示系统事件的对象。This constructor initializes an object that represents a system event. 可以创建多个 表示同一系统事件的对象。You can create multiple objects that represent the same system event. 如果系统事件不存在，则将使用指定的访问控制安全性来创建它。If the system event does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果该事件存在，则忽略指定的访问控制安全性。If the event exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 调用方对新创建的对象拥有完全控制权， 即使 `eventSecurity` 拒绝或无法向当前用户授予某些访问权限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `eventSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 但是，如果当前用户尝试 使用构造函数或方法获取表示相同命名事件的另一个对象， 则应用 Windows 访问控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named event, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果为参数指定了名称的系统事件 `name` 已存在，则忽略该 `initialState` 参数。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 调用此构造函数后，在 Visual Basic) 中为参数 (参数指定的变量中的值， `ref` `ByRef` `createdNew` 以确定已存在还是已创建已命名的系统事件。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic) `createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果事件的初始状态为非终止，则等待事件的线程将会阻止。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止" 并且为 指定了标志 `mode` ，则等待事件的线程不会阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态为 "已终止"，并且 `mode` 为 ，则将立即释放等待事件的第一个线程，在此之后，事件将被重置，后续线程将被阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的已命名系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用 方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果此事件不存在，则将使用初始所有权和访问控制安全性来创建该事件，拒绝当前用户使用该事件，但会授予读取和更改事件权限的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用时引发访问冲突异常 。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获到异常，该示例使用 方法重载来等待事件，该事件具有读取和更改权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，将以等待事件的权限打开事件，并向其发出信号。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，该示例将使用新的权限运行。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，它表示当前 对象所表示的已命名系统事件的访问控件安全性。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the access control security for the named system event represented by the current object.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它表示已命名系统事件的访问控制安全性。

span.span: An object that represents the access control security for the named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用按位 "或" 运算) 组合 (下面的标志组合来搜索权限： 、 和 。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 用户必须具有 调用此方法的权限，并且必须使用标志打开事件 。The user must have rights to call this method, and the event must have been opened with the flag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的已命名系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用 方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果此事件不存在，则将使用初始所有权和访问控制安全性来创建该事件，拒绝当前用户使用该事件，但会授予读取和更改事件权限的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用时引发访问冲突异常 。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获到异常，该示例使用 方法重载来等待事件，该事件具有读取和更改权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 读取权限后，使用 方法，并更改事件时，将使用等待请求并向其发出信号来打开事件。After the permissions have been read, using the method, and changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，该示例将使用新的权限运行。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.EventWaitHandle OpenExisting (string name);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.EventWaitHandle OpenExisting(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenExisting (name As String) As EventWaitHandle
public: static System::Threading::EventWaitHandle ^ OpenExisting(System::String ^ name);
static member OpenExisting : string -> System.Threading.EventWaitHandle

param.name: name
param.span: 要打开的系统同步事件的名称。

span.span: The name of the system synchronization event to open.

summary.span: 打开指定名称为同步事件（如果已经存在）。

span.span: Opens the specified named synchronization event, if it already exists.

returns.span: 一个对象，表示已命名的系统事件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法尝试打开指定的已命名系统事件。The method tries to open the specified named system event. 如果系统事件不存在，此方法将引发异常，而不是创建系统事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要在不存在系统事件时创建系统事件，请使用 具有参数的构造函数之一 `name` 。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 对此方法使用相同值的多个调用 `name` 不一定会返回相同的 对象，即使返回的对象表示相同的命名系统事件也是如此。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. 此方法重载等效于调用 方法重载，并 使用按位 "或" 运算来指定和权限。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定 标志将允许线程等待已命名的系统事件，并指定 标志允许线程调用 和 方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的已命名系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用 方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果此事件不存在，则将使用初始所有权和访问控制安全性来创建该事件，拒绝当前用户使用该事件，但会授予读取和更改事件权限的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用时引发访问冲突异常 。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获到异常，该示例使用 方法重载来等待事件，该事件具有读取和更改权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，将以等待事件的权限打开事件，并向其发出信号。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，该示例将使用新的权限运行。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`参数必须包括 允许线程等待事件的标志，以及 允许线程调用 和方法的标志 。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 此 方法尝试打开现有的已命名系统事件。The method tries to open an existing named system event. 如果系统事件不存在，此方法将引发异常，而不是创建系统事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要在不存在系统事件时创建系统事件，请使用 具有参数的构造函数之一 `name` 。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 对此方法使用相同值的多个调用 `name` 不一定会返回相同的 对象，即使返回的对象表示相同的命名系统事件也是如此。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的已命名系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用 方法重载来测试是否存在已命名的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果此事件不存在，则将使用初始所有权和访问控制安全性来创建该事件，拒绝当前用户使用该事件，但会授予读取和更改事件权限的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用时引发访问冲突异常 。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获到异常，该示例使用 方法重载来等待事件，该事件具有读取和更改权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，将以等待事件的权限打开事件，并向其发出信号。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口运行已编译的示例，该示例将使用新的权限运行。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. summary.span: 将事件状态设置为有信号，从而允许一个或多个等待线程继续执行。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to signaled, allowing one or more waiting threads to proceed.

returns.span: 如果该操作成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation succeeds; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 包含 ) 的 ( ，此 方法将释放单个线程。For an with (including ), the method releases a single thread. 如果没有等待线程，则等待句柄会保持终止状态，直到某个线程尝试等待它，或直到 调用其方法为止。If there are no waiting threads, the wait handle remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it, or until its method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不保证每次调用方法时， 都将从 其重置模式为的中释放线程 。There is no guarantee that every call to the method will release a thread from an whose reset mode is . 如果两次调用都过于接近，因此在释放线程之前发生第二次调用，则只释放一个线程。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released. 就好像未发生第二次调用一样。It is as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果在没有 等待的线程并且已 发出信号的情况下调用，则调用不起作用。Also, if is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect. 对于 包含 ) 的 ( ，调用 方法会使等待句柄处于终止状态，直到调用其 方法。For an with (including ), calling the method leaves the wait handle in a signaled state until its method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法重载，以允许主线程向阻止的线程发出信号，并等待线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 该示例启动五个线程，并允许它们阻止 使用标志创建的 ，然后在每次用户按 ENTER 键时释放一个线程。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 然后，该示例将另一线程排队，并通过使用标志创建的所有线程释放它们 。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命名同步事件不存在，则此方法不会创建它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要在不存在系统事件时创建系统事件，请使用 具有参数的构造函数之一 `name` 。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果不确定是否存在已命名的同步事件，请使用此方法重载，而不是 方法重载，如果同步事件不存在，则会引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. 此方法重载等效于调用 方法重载，并 使用按位 "或" 运算来指定和权限。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定 标志将允许线程等待已命名的系统事件，并指定 标志允许线程调用 和 方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. 对此方法使用相同值的多个调用 `name` 不一定会返回相同的 对象，即使返回的对象表示相同的命名系统事件也是如此。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

summary.span: 使用所需的安全访问权限，打开指定的命名同步事件（如果已经存在），并返回指示操作是否成功的值。

span.span: Opens the specified named synchronization event, if it already exists, with the desired security access, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果成功打开命名同步事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the named synchronization event was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命名同步事件不存在，则此方法不会创建它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要在不存在系统事件时创建系统事件，请使用 具有参数的构造函数之一 `name` 。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果不确定是否存在已命名的同步事件，请使用此方法重载，而不是 方法重载，如果同步事件不存在，则会引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. `rights`参数必须包括 允许线程等待事件的标志，以及 允许线程调用 和方法的标志 。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 对此方法使用相同值的多个调用 `name` 不一定会返回相同的 对象，即使返回的对象表示相同的命名系统事件也是如此。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

span.span: is an empty string.
-or-
is longer than 260 characters.
is .
A Win32 error occurred.

exception.span: 命名事件存在，但用户不具有所需的安全访问权限。

span.span: The named event exists, but the user does not have the desired security access.
